title: Sport24 : Sports News
summary: Find all the Sport24.com various headings in your application
description: Find out all the real-time sports wherever you are with Sport.24: results, matches, calendar of events and live rankings. 24/7: 25 sports and 75 events. Soccer, rugby, tennis, formula 1, handball, basket, motorcycle, cycling…Sport24.com application is arranged visually to afford quick and comfortable reading: Fast, modern, fluid and fun! •	Lateral navigation : Easy and fast slide between sport home•	Configure your application and access to your favorite news by mouse click Stay updated about more than 100 sports and covered live events: soccer (Champions League, Liga, Premier League, Bundesliga, Football World Cup, French Football Cup…), tennis (ATP, Rolland Garros, Wimbledon, Davis Cup…), basket (NBA, Pro A, Euro League…), rugby (Top 14, 6 Nations, Rugby World Cup…), golf, handball, biking (Tour de France, Giro d’Italia…), formula 1, volleyball, motorcycle, rally…All the real-time sports news at your finger tips: •	Access to the last news: all the live sport news about your athletes, your teams, the Mercato and the results of your favorite’s competitions. •	Be constantly informed thanks to the Flash•	Matches Live scoring and live commentary. See the latest scrores and rankings of your favorite’s teams. Never miss a beat! •	Live the sport through the section “Multimedia”. You can watch daily updated videos and pictures and highlights from recent games of the leading European leagues, or from other types of sports such as tennis, rugby, basketball, formula 1…•	All the news about your favorite soccer’s teams (PSG, OM, Real Madrid, Manchester United, Milano AC, FC Bayern Munchen…), rugby (Saracens, Leicester, Harlequins, Northampton, Gloucester…) and all the news of your favorite players. Find all the Sport24.com various headings : •	NEWS : last news about your favorite team, your favorite player and your favorite competition •	FLASH : to keep up to date with all the latest real-time news•	MULTIMEDIA : new picture and new video everyday•	LIVE : matches live scoring •	CALENDAR : competition Schedule•	STANDING : live standing of your favorite competition
descriptionHTML:
Find out all the real-time sports wherever you are with Sport.24: results, matches, calendar of events and live rankings. 24/7: 25 sports and 75 events. Soccer, rugby, tennis, formula 1, handball, basket, motorcycle, cycling…

Sport24.com application is arranged visually to afford quick and comfortable reading: Fast, modern, fluid and fun!
• Lateral navigation : Easy and fast slide between sport home
• Configure your application and access to your favorite news by mouse click

Stay updated about more than 100 sports and covered live events: soccer (Champions League, Liga, Premier League, Bundesliga, Football World Cup, French Football Cup…), tennis (ATP, Rolland Garros, Wimbledon, Davis Cup…), basket (NBA, Pro A, Euro League…), rugby (Top 14, 6 Nations, Rugby World Cup…), golf, handball, biking (Tour de France, Giro d’Italia…), formula 1, volleyball, motorcycle, rally…

All the real-time sports news at your finger tips:
• Access to the last news: all the live sport news about your athletes, your teams, the Mercato and the results of your favorite’s competitions.
• Be constantly informed thanks to the Flash
• Matches Live scoring and live commentary. See the latest scrores and rankings of your favorite’s teams. Never miss a beat!
• Live the sport through the section “Multimedia”. You can watch daily updated videos and pictures and highlights from recent games of the leading European leagues, or from other types of sports such as tennis, rugby, basketball, formula 1…
• All the news about your favorite soccer’s teams (PSG, OM, Real Madrid, Manchester United, Milano AC, FC Bayern Munchen…), rugby (Saracens, Leicester, Harlequins, Northampton, Gloucester…) and all the news of your favorite players.

Find all the Sport24.com various headings :
• NEWS : last news about your favorite team, your favorite player and your favorite competition
• FLASH : to keep up to date with all the latest real-time news
• MULTIMEDIA : new picture and new video everyday
• LIVE : matches live scoring
• CALENDAR : competition Schedule
• STANDING : live standing of your favorite competition
comments: Salut Je veux juste recuperer ma page

Improvement required Lorsque l'on scroll down tout en bas de la page, l'application freeze. Autre motif d'insatisfaction certains sujets de la page d'accueil lorsque l'on y accède renvoie à un sujet totalement différent du titre et de l'image. 2 étoiles car aucun article n'est payant.
Brilliant if you speak French. Better than most, but please have an English option.
